_title_display: Advis fidelle aux veritables Hollandois. Touchant ce qui s'est passé dans les villages de Bodegrave & Swammerdam, & les cruautés inoüies, que les François y ont exercées. Avec un memoire de la derniere marche de l'armée du roy de France en Brabant & en Flandre.

title.value: Advis fidelle aux veritables Hollandois. Touchant ce qui s'est passé dans les villages de Bodegrave & Swammerdam, & les cruautés inoüies, que les François y ont exercées. Avec un memoire de la derniere marche de l'armée du roy de France en Brabant & en Flandre.

identifier.volume: Getty Research Institute digitized version (Internet Archive)

description.value: Doubts have been raised about Barbier's attribution of this work tò Abraham de Wicquefort. See Willems, who cites as printers the brothers Steucker at The Hague.
Plates are double-page etchings by Romeyn de Hooghe, tipped onto stubs at the centerfold.
Binding: sprinkled sheepskin. Spine and edges of boards tooled in black. Title tooled in black on spine label.

Signature on t.p. of Ferdinand Baron de Plettenberg ex Nortkirchen, with the Nordkirchen bookplate on front pastedown. Ownership inscription of Lisa & Leonard Baskin on back pastedown dated 1962, with Baskin's initial B written in pencil after signature letter L, and his printed labels for Fort Hill and Lurley Manor on front pastedown.
